Sentencas: To meet the performance requirements of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) metallic interconnect, the Mn-Co-O spinel coating is prepared on the surface of AISI430 by pack cementation method to reduce the growth kinetics of oxides and inhibit the outward diffusion of Cr.
Titulo: The preparation and properties of Mn-Co-O spinel coating for SOFC metallic interconnect

Sentencas: The microstructural characterization shows that a dense, uniform, defect-free spinel coating is successfully fabricated on the surface of AISI430.
Titulo: The preparation and properties of Mn-Co-O spinel coating for SOFC metallic interconnect

Sentencas: Under the simulated SOFC cathode environment, the weight gain of coated steel (0.608 mg cm(-2)) after oxidation at 800 degrees C for 800 h is significantly lower than that of uncoated (1.586 mg cm(-2)).
Titulo: The preparation and properties of Mn-Co-O spinel coating for SOFC metallic interconnect

Sentencas: In addition, the area specific resistance (ASR) of the coated steel oxidized for 500 h is 17.69 m
Titulo: The preparation and properties of Mn-Co-O spinel coating for SOFC metallic interconnect

Sentencas: Omega cm2, much smaller than that of the bare steel, indicating that the oxidation resistance and electrical conductivity of AISI430 are significantly improved by Mn-Co-O spinel coating.
Titulo: The preparation and properties of Mn-Co-O spinel coating for SOFC metallic interconnect

Sentencas: Crosssectional observations of the Mn-Co-O spinel coating are conducted to assess the compatibility of substrate with the adjacent coating and its effectiveness in reducing the growth of the Cr2O3 layer.
Titulo: The preparation and properties of Mn-Co-O spinel coating for SOFC metallic interconnect
